channel.title: Discord of Lies! Signups (DISCORD LINK INSIDE)
channel.description:
## Welcome to the first Discord of Lies! ## Hosted by the Prince Plex ## Co-hosted by Queen Alfa ###### Note: The bot is not finished yet, there are definitely flaws in it and that's why you're testing it, in a way. --------------------
# General Gameplay Infomation
## Rules 1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. Respect the host and the players 3. If you haven't posted content in 12 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. If you don't respond to that prod in 18 hours, you will be force replaced. 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 5. Do not screen-shot private host messages 6. Don't throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 8. Let's all have fun and play together! 9. ~~We may add rules as we go...~~
## Gameplay * Days last 24 hours, or until a majority is reached for execution. Nights last 12 hours. * All actions must be sent to the mod via Discord DM. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Channel in the Server. * The priest will speak with the dead through a special Channel in the Server. * Trial's are automatically done via commands: • !vote @user: Votes the mentioned user. • !execute/pardon: votes for the accused to be executed or pardoned. * You will have your own little channel where to use your abilities, your journal and your deathnote. * The King elections will be done during the day. If you have Royal Blood, announce yourself with Bold Letters saying **I will be King** :crown: (include the emote) and Ping @King so we can see it.
## Action Results
[details=Night] You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed [/details]
[details=Day] You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened [/details]
## Classes:
#### All ToL and FoL Classes will be involved along with 3 Exclusive only to Discord of Lies classes!
# [The First Discord of Lies Exclusive Class](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-the-virtuoso/2284)
# [The Second Discord of Lies Exclusive Class](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-masochist-neutral-social/3194)
# Sign up by Posting below! You can also sign up to spectate!
Comment with one of these: **/join** **/spectate** **/backup**
## Players who signed up: 1. PKR 2. Simon 3. Polik 4. Moleland 5. NuclearBurrito 6. Damafaud 7. Ashe 8. Icibalus 9. Wolfy 10. Methnor 11. Jammy 12. Rogue 13. Strangle 14. RopeNormTheStringNormie 15. Braixen 16. Hippolytus
Spectate: * Insanity
